Description:
Northside delight
Situated in the Potters Northside Estate is this stunning 3 bedroom plus study home. This 2 year old family home is sure to impress.
- Featuring; an impressive Kitchen with Ceasar stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel oven and opens to a large meals and family area.
- Master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe
- Gas ducted heating, cooling, decking area, outside storage and an oversized single garage.
Located within close proximity to all amenities including local schools, shopping centre and Monash Freeway access.

North side Grandvue living
Perfectly situated on the North side of Officer in the desirable Grandvue Estate is this beautiful family home.
- 4 spacious bedrooms, master with WIR, ensuite and split system cooling
- Kitchen with s/s appliances and large open plan dining and living area
- Ducted heating throughout, second split system in living area

Walking distance to St Francis Xavier College, St Clare's Primary, Arena Shopping Centre, Lakeside Primary School, Lakeside Recreation Reserve, close to Cardinia Train Station and M1 Freeway access

Description:
Love Where You Live
Why wait through the delays of building new when you can have something that still feels like new and is ready now!? With a modern design and an established front garden, all that is left to do is simply unpack and relax!
Easy to care for both inside and out, there will be plenty of time to explore your wonderful surroundings. Stroll to Caversham Waters Wetlands, dine at Club Officer, choose from Lakeside Square or Arena Shopping Centre, grab a train to the city via Cardinia Road Train Station, walk the little ones to Creative Garden Early Learning or Pakenham Lakeside Primary School and let the bigger kids ride their bikes to Lakeside College. Commuters also have their choice of the two major road links; the Princes Highway and Monash Freeway.
A monochromatic colour palette to suit any taste flows throughout the home. Enjoy zoned family living with two separate living areas, four generous bedrooms and two bathrooms. The first living room is a separate space ideal for entertaining guests and the rear living zone is an open plan kitchen, meals and family area perfect for everyday living and messy family fun. The well appointed kitchen features white cabinetry with contrasting black stone benchtops, a 5-burner gas cooktop, 900mm wide oven, dishwasher, microwave recess, tiled splashback, wall pantry and breakfast bar.
The large master suite comes complete with walk in robe and private ensuite whilst three additional bedrooms, two built in robes, a family bathroom, separate WC and large laundry conclude the internal layout. Ducted heating and two reverse cycle air conditioners keep the family comfortable all year round and a double garage offers two secure parking spaces.
Outside, the backyard accommodates a large timber deck for parties, barbeques and unwinding with a glass of wine or your favourite hot beverage.
Ideal for first home buyers and busy families, this spacious abode close to all amenities is sure to be a great live in or lease out investment!
Insights: 8 Longmeadow Road, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2013 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
LAND THIS ONE!
If you have been looking for a beautiful block in a premier location, you certainly wont be disappointed by 8 Lyntonlee Avenue, Officer.
This titled block is 392m² - featuring dimensions of 14m x 28m with no easements.
Sitting in an elevated position within The Rise estate on the northside of Officer, it certainly ticks the box for convenient location, as you are just a short stroll from an array of schools + parks and a short drive to shops and access to the Monash Freeway.
East facing with potential to build a beautiful home with north facing living zones makes this the ideal opportunity.
Its the perfect time to build your new dream home. Contact Samantha on 0478 178 618 for more information today.

Description:
Development Site
24 Bayview Road, Officer is a wonderful investment site with just over 1/2 acre of land.
The site has a spacious 3 bedroom residence which is perfect for creating an instant rental income. This property would largely suit investors and developers looking at either sub-dividing or building multiple townhouses (STCA).
- Wonderful North side of the Highway location, surrounded by 4 schools within walking distance and minutes to the established townships of Berwick and Beaconsfield.
- Minutes to shopping centre, Officer Railway Station, Universities and Casey Hospital.
- Walking distance to future Officer Activity Centre.
- Easy access to Monash Freeway - Melbourne CBD (50 minutes)
Investors should not let this opportunity pass by!

Description:
Verve Your Way
Located in the thriving Arcadia Estate is where you will find this gem of a home nestled away from the hustle and bustle in a quiet street. The home boasts a sizeable 464m2 (approx) of prime Officer land. The home has been carefully thought out with the master bedroom located at the front of the home which is complete with full ensuite and walk in robe. As you move through the house a generous sized formal lounge welcomes you and to the rear of the home you will find the neat as a pin open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher that overlooks the sun drenched living and meals area. Off the living you will find a further 3 bedrooms with built in robes which share a central bathroom. Further to this you will find a study, double garage, split system air-conditioner and ducted heating. The home is currently tenanted on a fixed lease until September at $370 per week. Close to wetlands, walking tracks, schools, shops and public transport this home will be perfect for investors and home owners alike.

Description:
DON'T BE A SLAVE TO RENT
This perfectly located property in Officer has an enduring floorplan and finish. Just 1.5 years young, no expense has been spared with luxury in mind. Featuring modern tiled flooring and carpet, 3 bedrooms, master with en-suite and walk-in robe, remaining 2 bedrooms with built-in robes and an open plan kitchen/meals/living area.
The hub of the home is the open plan living area that is light filled. The stone kitchen features a large 90cm cooker, canopy style rangehood and stainless-steel appliances. With both heating and cooling solutions (GDH, Evaporative Cooling), single garage with internal access and low 292m low maintenance block you will not want to leave.
Why Officer?
* Close to M1 Freeway
* Minutes to the Beaconsfield and Arena Shopping precincts
* Walk to Timbertop Café
* Quality Schools Nearby e.g. St Brigid's Catholic Primary School and Officer Primary/secondary Schools
Don't wait for land to title, this home is ready now, short settlement is possible.
Come to one of our regular open for inspections or call us directly to book a private viewing or to discuss your property needs.

Semi Rural Living with Superb Views
Situated on a made road minutes to Officer township is this affordable property on over an acre, unique to the market. The property offers astute buyers a completely private setting landscaped with beautiful oaks, maples and a mini orchard. There is a fully contained dwelling and a sizeable shed, with mains water and electricity connected. From the top of the hillock, enjoy the most stunning views of the region, the idyllic setting to build your dream home. Located within minutes to a multitude of schools, shopping precincts and the freeway makes for convenient living.

Description:
EX DISPLAY IN GRANDVUE
Sitting on 512m2 of land in the highly sort after Grandvue estate, on the North side of the highway, sits this immaculately kept ex display home, ready for new owners to call it home.
On entry of the home you are greeted by the large master suite which has well sized walk in robe and huge ensuite offering double vanity and oversized shower and separate toilet.
The home offers multiple living zones which is ideal for a growing family, with a formal lounge/theatre room at the front of the home and the large open plan kitchen offering large 900mm oven/cooktop, walk in pantry and stone benchtops whilst overlooking the generous tiled family in front and dining room to the side.
Stepping out to your backyard via the large sliding doors that open right up, which will be great for entertaining, and you will see the A grade landscaping that has been done which includes undercover inbuilt BBQ area, deck and private low maintenance backyard.
The remaining and generous three bedrooms are all featured at the back of the property and all come equipped with mirrored built in robes and easy access to the family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Added extras to this beautiful home include - Gas ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, Downlights throughout, NBN connected, Alarm System, Sprinkler System, High ceilings & Double lock up garage.
Living in Grandvue Officer gives you the convenience of having it all, being in such close proximity to local schools, shops, public transport and easy access to the M1. This property will tick boxes you didnt even know you had make sure you add it to your list for this weekend or call our office to arrange your private viewing!
Identification is required at all open homes.
*All information contained therein is gathered from relevant third-party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.
Confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Description:
Grand Scale Living in Grandvue!
Flawlessly presented and built to the highest calibre, this family home delivers a quality build with attention to the finest detail and a functional family friendly design. Built to stand out with a radiating visual appeal through its modern façade, making you want to call this home.
The home showcases open plan living, creating a magnificent sense of space and comfort. A master chefs kitchen with stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, innovative storage solutions and separate walk in pantry. A generous meals area flows effortlessly into a spacious living room featuring a gas log fireplace that is certain to make a statement. With an additional lounge area situated to the back of the home, ensuring all members of the family feel at home.
Flowing on from the main living are beautiful slider doors open to the grand outdoor alfresco, perfect for summer BBQs spent with family and friends which overlooks the easy to maintain garden, completing this fantastic family adobe.
An outstanding master suite with walk in robe and private ensuite with double vanity, double shower and separate toilet. Spacious three bedrooms all with built in robes and serviced by the main bathroom.
Impressive comforts to enjoy include, but not limited to: ducted heating and evaporative cooling, double remote garage with internal access and real roller door access for caravans, boats etc, garden shed and quality flooring and tiling throughout the home.
All the luxuries of this home in the desirable Grandvue Estate, within walking distance to Arena Shopping Centre, St Francis College, St Clares Primary, Cardinia train station and Freeway access.
Call Angelia now to schedule an inspection or see us at our opens!

Description:
Lifestyle, location, low maintenance
Its no wonder why this little pocket of Officer has been such a popular pick amongst families. With a functional floor plan and sitting on a low maintenance 420sq block this home has been designed with families and entertainers in mind. From the moment you step inside you get that overwhelming feeling of warmth, comfort and style.
This property's features include.
- Four generous sized bedrooms, all with built in robes, the master bedroom with its walk in robe, ensuite with a double vanity.
- A modern spacious kitchen with all stainless steel appliances, built in pantry, tiled splash back and heaps of storage and bench space. A perfect spacious kitchen for a family.
- An amazing outdoor alfresco fully decked and undercover with a built in bbq, so much space to be the host for those amazing parties with family and friends.
- Two spacious living areas, one being the designed theatre room to watch those movies on those cold nights.
- Double lock up garage with internal access
- Fully landscaped at the front and back of the property which is so easy to maintain.
- Other extras include high ceilings, led downlights and ducted vacuum, evaporative cooling, ducted heating and a split system.
Just a short drive to the M1 Freeway Access, minutes from local shops, schools and parks, 6 Egerton Street Officer is going to attract a lot of attention as it simply ticks all the boxes for any first home buyer or investor, please contact Victor from Obrien Real Estate to organize a private inspection.

Description:
Forget the Hassle of Building & Move Straight In
Set in the heart of Officer in the popular Arcadia estate, this beautiful abode will no doubt leave a lasting impression and is a must see for anyone wanting only the highest levels of quality and low maintenance living.
Boasting:
A well-appointed stylish kitchen with an abundance of bench and cupboard space, stainless steel appliances; including gas cooktop, electric oven and dishwasher.
Sleeping accommodation boasts a large parents retreat with timber plantation shutters, ensuite and walk in robe. The remaining 2 bedrooms, situated at the side-rear wing of the home, are all generous in size with mirrored built in robes, serviced by the main bathroom & a separate toilet.
Light-filled open kitchen meals/family area with sliding door to the rear decking/backyard.
North-facing private outdoor decking; perfect for entertaining with friends and family.
Established & low maintenance landscaped garden.
Additional features include: Gas ducted heating, split system air-conditioner, private outdoor decking area, 3kW solar power system, remote controlled double lock up garage with internal access and so much more.
Amenities close by include: Lakeside Square & Arena shopping centre, cafes, restaurants, parklands, walking tracks, Lakeside Primary, Officer Secondary, St Clairs Primary & Secondary, Cardinia Rd train station, Officer train station, bus routes to Fountain Gate & Pakenham and quick access to the M1 freeway.

Description:
Brand New Beauty
Currently under construction and to be completed in June, you will be instantly drawn to this stunning Rawdon Hill home. Stepping through the doorway you are greeted with an expansive hallway with flowing floorboards that leads you through the well thought out floorplan. The master bedroom is located at the front of the home and is complete with fitted out walk in robe and full ensuite. A second generous sized bedroom is located to the right of the home whilst you will find the lounge room to the left. Nearing the end of the hallway a clever design allows for a study nook before opening out to the light filled open plan living and dining area. Over looking the open plan living is a gorgeous kitchen that the most discerning of Chefs would enjoy including two tone kitchen 900mm stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops and butlers pantry. Two further bedrooms both have built in robes and share a central bathroom. Enjoy the benefits of a brand new home with 7 years building warranty or if youre an investor a full depreciation schedule is a must. Located in the thriving Rise Estate and with an extensive inclusions list this home wont last long

Description:
Titled Vacant Land in Heathfield Estate Officer!!
If you are looking to build your dream home - this is the block for you. The block is located right behind Timbertop Estate, in close proximity to shopping centres, established shops, cafes, restaurants, gyms, and footy clubs. There are three train stations nearby being Officer, Cardinia Road & Beaconsfield and it is only a short drive to the Princes Highway and M1 Freeway.
You have the choice of schools, being public or private, primary or secondary as Berwick Grammar School, Heritage College, and St Brigids Catholic Primary School are within walking distance.
Approximately 353 sqm with a 14.10m frontage and 25m of depth.

Description:
Three Bedroom plus Study!
An immaculate and utterly stylish display of single level living is on offer here with this brilliant 3 bedroom + study, 2 bathroom home wonderfully positioned on a 407sqm (approx) corner block. Young families will absolutely love this pristine property, which impresses with sleek timber floors, plantation shutters, quality carpet, and so much more! Expansive lounge and dining has incredible space and access out to a pergola courtyard and manicured garden which will get a great workout in Melbourne's warmer months. Back inside and appreciate the beautiful stone kitchen which offers an island bench, glass splashback, and stainless steel appliances. The master bedroom has a walk-in robe and elegant ensuite, while two other bedrooms have easy access to the quality central bathroom. Further additions include a study, laundry, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, rainwater tank, shed, and a double garage with store area. Near Officer Secondary College, Glenvale College (Cardinia campus), St. Clare's Primary School, Arena Shopping Centre, Arena Park, Heatherbrae Recreation Reserve, buses, Officer Station, and easy access to Princes Highway.
Insights: 24 Georgetown Way, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand New Oasis
Welcome to this exciting new light and bright spacious home. Featuring 4 bedrooms, 2 separate living areas in the sought after Cherrington Estate, Officer. The open plan design features high ceilings; modern kitchen with ceasarstone bench tops and a stunning island bench which overlooks the living area and the rear garden, stunning stainless steel appliances have been appointed to please the chef of the house. Master bedroom includes en-suite and walk-in robe with the further 3 bedrooms all with BIR . Additional features include remote control double garage, ducted heating and cooling, high ceilings, and laundry. Easy access to Monash Freeway and Princes Highway, short distance to Officer railway station, close to parkland, schools , shopping centres and so much more. Dont miss the opportunity to secure this delightful home!
Insights: 4 Eliza Terrace, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.
